评论详情: My 2 yr old is obsessed with tractors and this set was a hit. The top fit well, but the pants were too long. The pants actually fit my thinner 3 yr old better, so I split the set up between my kids. The material for the set is ok. It's not lined and the fabric is a bit rough, but I think it's fine as toddler play clothes.
My cutie looks so nice in this outfit. The fall season was upon us and this outfit was so adorable to wear out and to church. Came quickly and well packaged.

类型: Color: Apricot-old Macdonald Had a FarmSize: 0-6 Months
评论详情: Got this outfit for a baby shower gift, and it is so cute!!! I forgot to snap a picture of it before wrapping it up, but it is true to the pictures, though it did need a good steaming after unpacking it to smooth out the wrinkles. The material is lightweight and pretty thin, so not the warmest. But it is soft and feels like good quality. I'd just say it will need some layering for colder climates. I got the size 0-6 months and it looks true to size as well. So excited to gift this outfit! It is seriously adorable!
True to size. Could launder better but seems to hold up to washer and dryer okay.

I got this as a gift and was happy with the quality and price . Very soft and so cute.  This particular outfit reminds me of John Deere! This is for an 11th month old boy and I got it in size 12 to 18 months.
I bought this outfit as a gift for a two year old as I thought it is cute with the truck on the top.  It was a good price as well.
This is a really nice set. Good quality and perfect fit. The design is so cute and my little guy finds it comfortable
Super excited that the tractor is slightly elevated from the shirt! It makes it a fun sensory shirt! I honestly cannot wait for my grandson to open this one up for Christmas!

评论概述: Out of all outfits, this one gets the most compliments
评论详情: I ordered this on a whim and wish I had done it earlier. This outfit, especially the Farm Tractor top, gets SO many compliments from strangers. Yesterday, someone said it was like "John Deere meets Etsy," and I couldn't agree more. The pants are pretty nice, too, and for the brisk winter temperatures we've been getting, they are perfect.
This set is so cute and cozy however I was sent the wrong size.

类型: Color: Gray-dibs on the Buddy SeatSize: 6-12 Months
评论详情: This outfit is very adorable. The material seems to be very soft and very well made. Fits my 6 month old grandson perfect.
It is a cute outfit but the top seemed to be a more pinkish hue than tan

类型: Color: Khaki-life is Better on the FarmSize: 2-3T
评论详情: 2-3T is a solid 3 T so we will have to wait till next year to use it but it’s well made, soft and comfy. It washed up great. The head hole is perfectly sized. Nice quality material and thickness. Great price.
This precious farmer outfit is so soft, stretchy, warm, and comfortable. This is made from high quality material and is a good value. My son loves wearing it and it fits true to size.

评论概述: Very cute, but the fabric quality is poor.
评论详情: It’s a beautiful set, but I’m very particular about fabrics, especially for my baby. The outside is decent, but the inside feels very cheap; you can feel the polyester, and it feels rough. It could work if paired with cotton winter underwear. It is well made and seems durable. I loved the tractor embroidery and the cut of the pants.
